name: Spring King
details:
Spring ReverbSPRING KING™
Yes, it has a REAL SPRING REVERB TANK INSIDE! Great 50’s era reverb with the convenience of a pedal. “Kick pad” for over-the-top reverb explosions, just like you get from kicking your reverb combo across the stage. Way fun!
http://danelectro.com/product/spring-king-reverb/
